title: [BOOM-5569] Email alerts out of stock notifications problem
body: > This issue has been migrated from the Forge. Read the [original ticket here](http://forge.prestashop.com/browse/BOOM-5569). - _**Reporter:**_ cubik - _**Created at:**_ Fri, 18 May 2018 09:25:37 +0200 When i am deleting a product with 500 combinations for example and i have enabled to receive notifications for low stock quantity from ps_mailalerts module, i am receiving 500 notifications out of stock emails. I think that should not happening --- #### Describe the bug When i am deleting a product with 500 combinations for example and i have enabled to receive notifications for low stock quantity from ps_mailalerts module, i am receiving 500 notifications out of stock emails. #### Expected behavior Do not send low stock alert email if the product is deleted #### Steps to Reproduce 1. **BO**>**SELL**>**Catalog**>**Products** 2. Delete a product with combinations (for exemple: the **Hummingbird printed t-shirt**, 8 combinations) 3. Check your mail, you will receive 8 mails => NOK **Screenshots** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23308427/105640138-9ee9a500-5e7c-11eb-8d44-34035fc83746.png) #### Additional information * PrestaShop version: 1.7.7.1 & develop * PHP version: 7.2 * Mail Alert version: 2.2.1
bodyHTML:
This issue has been migrated from the Forge. Read the original ticket here.

  • Reporter: cubik
  • Created at: Fri, 18 May 2018 09:25:37 +0200

When i am deleting a product with 500 combinations for example and i have enabled to receive notifications for low stock quantity from ps_mailalerts module, i am receiving 500 notifications out of stock emails.

I think that should not happening

Describe the bug

When i am deleting a product with 500 combinations for example and i have enabled to receive notifications for low stock quantity from ps_mailalerts module, i am receiving 500 notifications out of stock emails.

Expected behavior

Do not send low stock alert email if the product is deleted

Steps to Reproduce

  1. BO>SELL>Catalog>Products
  2. Delete a product with combinations (for exemple: the Hummingbird printed t-shirt, 8 combinations)
  3. Check your mail, you will receive 8 mails => NOK

Screenshots

Additional information

  • PrestaShop version: 1.7.7.1 & develop
  • PHP version: 7.2
  • Mail Alert version: 2.2.1

I think that should not happening 

Describe the bug
When i am deleting a product with 500 combinations for example and i have enabled to receive notifications for low stock quantity from ps_mailalerts module, i am receiving 500 notifications out of stock emails.
Expected behavior
Do not send low stock alert email if the product is deleted
Steps to Reproduce

BO>SELL>Catalog>Products
Delete a product with combinations (for exemple: the Hummingbird printed t-shirt, 8 combinations)
Check your mail, you will receive 8 mails => NOK

Screenshots

Additional information

PrestaShop version: 1.7.7.1 & develop
PHP version: 7.2
Mail Alert version: 2.2.1

node.body:
> This comment has been migrated from the Forge. Read the [original comment here](http://forge.prestashop.com/browse/BOOM-5569#comment-167997). - _**Author:**_ khouloud.belguith - _**Created at:**_ Fri, 18 May 2018 10:15:17 +0200

Hi Stelios,

Thanks for your report.
I manage to reproduce the issue with the last version 1.7.3.2 and the ps_emailalerts v2.0.1 - by PrestaShop.
Deleting a product with X combinations => the same email out of stock is sending x times.
The email does not print the name of a combination product.
I’ll add this to the debug roadmap so that it’s fixed. If you have already fixed it on your end or if you think you can do it, please do send us a pull request!.

Best regards, Khouloud

When I edit the quantity of the combination to 0 => I receive with a mail with product name & combination name=> OK.

Thanks!

node.body:
Hello Prestashop Devs, I love your product, running it on 1.7.6.1 and plan to upgrade to 1.7.6.8.  I also suffer from this bug with the out of stock spamming email. Is it fixed in a later version than 1.7.6.1 ? If not, any chance it will be fixed in a near future?
Actually, it seems like the checkbox to activate or deactivate the mail being sent has absolutely no effect. I tested with both settings and mail keep floating. 
Thanks to let us know yoru roadmap on this.. And keep up the good work !!!

node.body:
some debugging and notes for myself:

there are two different "out of stock" email notifications.
1) from core
https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/blob/develop/src/Core/Stock/StockManager.php#L311
2) from ps_mailalerts
https://github.com/PrestaShop/ps_emailalerts/blob/dev/ps_emailalerts.php#L586

ps_mailalerts can be turned off from the module settings

I don't see a way for disabling the core email other than removing the permission `ROLE_MOD_TAB_ADMINSTOCKMANAGEMENT_READ` from the user  (at least right now)

node.body:
ok, so this could probably be fixed with hooking into `actionEmailSendBefore` in ps_emailalerts and if the template is `productoutofstock` and the recipient is NOT on the ps_emailalerts recipient list returning null?

or adding a new "don't send emails to me" that the admin user can then set for themself?

or something else...

node.bodyHTML:
@PierreRambaud
Don't know if this should be done in the module or in the core, but we shouldn't receive the low stock alert email when the product is deleted
As the product is deleted it's obvious that it's not in stock anymore and the notification shouldn't be sent in this case

bodyParsed.sent: @PierreRambaud
Don't know if this should be done in the module or in the core, but we shouldn't receive the low stock alert email when the product is deleted
As the product is deleted it's obvious that it's not in stock anymore and the notification shouldn't be sent in this case
